description: System for managing donations, projects, funds, and donation workflows for Kupat Ha'ir

LutRecordStatus.description: Record Status - General table serving all main tables in DB to store record status

IsSystemValue.description: Whether this is a system value that cannot be modified or deleted

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange Rates - Currency exchange rates against Shekel

RateInILS.description: Currency exchange rate as of date (how many shekels equals one unit of the currency)

CurrencyRate.notes: Table will be updated via Job that will iterate over lutcurrency

Description.description: Country name in Hebrew for reports

Translations.description: Translations - Contains data translations for multiple tables in the system

RecordId.description: Record ID in the mentioned table for which this translation applies

CustomerUser.description: Customer Users - Users created through registration via customer website

LastDigits.description: Last 4 digits of card or text received from credit service in France

ParentName.description: Mother's name (possibly father's name when referring to soul commemoration)

LutCreditCardType.notes: Table is editable and does not contain system values

Role.notes: Permission profile purpose is to collect a set of permissions under a defined group and assign this permission set to system users

Permission.notes: In this table we will store all existing permissions in the system in a flat manner

system_values: Edit - Edit type permission (receives values: edit/readonly/none)

Name.description: Project name in Hebrew (for use in reports and understanding table content)

DisplayAsSelfView.description: Whether the project (and items under it) will be displayed on the site as a standalone view without Kupat Ha'ir elements

MainMedia.description: Link to main image or video for display on project page

ImageForListsView.description: Link to image for display in lists (news/donated/help funds)

DisplayItemsInProjectPage.description: Whether to display project items at bottom of project page

ProjectItemQuickDonationLocalization.description: Quick Donation Settings for Item in Specific Language

MoreItemLink.description: List of Additional Items for Display on Entity Page

EntityListViewOrderConfig.description: Config for Position Values/Maximum for LutListViewOrder Fields in System

EntityMoreDisplayLocation.description: Additional Locations for Entity Display in System

Name.description: Banner name for display in management system only

Order.description: Position in categories list (on funds page)

LutFundCategory.notes: Translations will be stored in Translations table

Name.description: Group name in Hebrew - serves for reports only

RecruitersGroup.notes: Translations for group names will be stored in Translations table

Description.description: Description for group that will appear in this language

Name.description: Recruiter name in Hebrew - serves for reports only

Recruiter.notes: Translations for recruiter names will be stored in Translations table

LutTag.notes: Table does not contain system values and is editable by user

Terminal.description: Terminals - List of terminals for credit card charging

Name.description: Terminal name in Hebrew (serves for reports)

UserName.description: Encrypted password of user for connecting to terminal

Terminal.notes: Currently we're talking about two terminals: Kupat Ha'ir and Karnot

multi_language_support.description: The system is built dynamically so there is no specific reference to a specific language
multi_language_support.implementation: Localization tables contain data for each language separately

entity_types.description: The system supports multiple entity types managed uniformly

record_status.description: All main tables use LutRecordStatus to store record status

audit_fields.description: Every main table contains audit tracking fields

translations.description: Translations table serves to translate fields from various tables

project_types.description: Projects can be of different types, each with different behavior in the system

item_types.description: Items can be of various types

payment_structure.description: The system supports both recurring and one-time payments

media_management.description: Media files are managed centrally with support for different platforms

link_settings.description: Sophisticated link system allowing configuration of links to projects and items with various parameters

design_patterns.soft_delete: Records are marked as deleted rather than physically removed (using RecordStatus)
design_patterns.audit_trail: All changes are tracked with timestamps and user information
design_patterns.multi_tenancy_support: System supports multiple languages and currencies
design_patterns.entity_attribute_value: Flexible tagging and categorization system for entities
design_patterns.localization_strategy: Separate localization tables for each main entity type
